name: THE LAST OF PAGANS
description:
This game was made in 7 days during the polish game jam called: "PolskiGamedev.pl: Polski GameJam".
It was originally created in polish language, but I've translated it to english.
Both versions are available to play.

Poland, year 1016.

For 50 years has the Catholic Church converted dispersed pagans to the path of Christianity.

Those who didn't want to convert got exhiled or killed. 

Unfortunately, it was impossible to beat some of the pagans. Those were getting recruited to a special mercenary squad, which was dealing fighting monsters for a small amount of cash and withdrawal of reformation.

You are the last pagan left on this land.

You have got only one task: to kill all of the beasts.

This is the final version of the project and it will NOT be updated anymore, despite some bugs.
